QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.person_id , t.death_date , t.death_datetime , t.death_type_concept_id , t.cause_concept_id , t.cause_source_value , t.cause_source_concept_id , ch.PartitionId FROM {sc}.death t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by ch.PartitionId, t.person_id
